title: How to answer an incoming call and make it as a conference call only if needed in twilio using python?
body:
I am new to Twilio and I need a solution on how to achieve this case. Let us consider that I receive a call to my Twilio number where an agent, say 'A' attends the call and speaks. On speaking, suppose if 'A' needs the call to be connected to 'B' while the caller is on hold and make it as a conference call where the caller, 'A' and 'B' are connected without the call being dropped. I am using Python with Flask framework and please help me on how to achieve this in Twilio?

Thank you.
